name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Course introducing the fundamentals of computer science, including algorithms, data structures, and programming techniques.

name: Computer Science Foundations
description: Course introducing the basics of computer architecture, operating systems, and software engineering.

name: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Course introducing the fundamentals of data structures and algorithms, including sorting, searching, and graph algorithms.

name: Programming Languages
description: Course introducing the fundamentals of programming languages, including syntax, semantics, and type systems.

name: Software Engineering
description: Course introducing the fundamentals of software engineering, including design patterns, testing, and debugging.

name: Computer Networks
description: Course introducing the fundamentals of computer networks, including protocols, routing, and security.

name: Computer Graphics
description: Course introducing the fundamentals of computer graphics, including 3D rendering, ray tracing, and animation.
